pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate (Generalized) Linear Mixed Models with Factor Structures // Utilizes the 'lme4' and 'optimx' packages (previously the optim() function from 'stats') to estimate (generalized) linear mixed models (GLMM) with factor structures using a profile likelihood approach, as outlined in Jeon and Rabe-Hesketh (2012) doi:10.3102/1076998611417628 and Rockwood and Jeon (2019) doi:10.1080/00273171.2018.1516541. Factor analysis and item response models can be extended to allow for an arbitrary number of nested and crossed random effects, making it useful for multilevel and cross-classified models.
